special_abilities.name: Dark Devotion.
descriptions: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The fanatic is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spell casting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
* 1st level (4 slots): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith
* 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Dagger.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
